TermDefinition.DefinitionText: A substance that is being studied for its ability to help other drugs reach the brain. It belongs to the family of drugs called bradykinin agonists. Also called lobradimil.

SpanishTermDefinition.DefinitionText: Sustancia en estudio por su capacidad de ayudar a que otros medicamentos lleguen al cerebro. Es un tipo de agonista de la bradicinina. Tambi√©n se llama lobradimil.
